medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began two months before the presentation, described as dull, aching, and moderate in severity, primarily aggravated by heavy lifting. The patient experienced some relief after taking ibuprofen.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of melanoma treated with excision, lymph-node dissection, and chemotherapy fifteen years prior.
medical_history.family_history: Sister died of ovarian cancer at sixteen years of age.
